title: Trump's orbit fear he's now 'flying blind': report
description: President Donald Trump is losing touch and becoming isolated, a White House journalist said Wednesday. Past presidents have also had to deal with appearing — or actually being — out of touch with what everyday Americans go through, between heightened security…
